entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS - UseArtifactsOutput true - run on physical device fails #26776

PullRequests

Created

  • Pickers Inside CollectionView get SelectedItem Cleared on Scrolling - FIX #26775
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker

Updated

  • Simplify iOS ScrollView #26763
    p/1, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 52 #26674
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 61 #26761
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
